about_the_game:
This is the "Complete Edition (CE)" of "Tricolour Lovestory".
Compared to the original version, we have changed the game engine, rewritten the script and made many optimizations and changes.

If your computer configuration allows, we strongly recommend that you download this version for a better experience.

How to Get Started

After downloading and installing this DLC, click "PLAY" in the "LIBRARY" page and select "Tricolour Lovestory -Complete Editon-" to start the game.

New Functions


  • Danmaku system supported, to share the fun with other players;
  • Mobile Link supported, to synchronize story progress across other terminals;
  • Supported In-game switching between "Simplified Chinese", "Traditional Chinese" and "English" subtitles;
  • Added Gesture system and other handy system features, touchscreen experience optimized.

Content Changes


  • Added no less than 3 new CGs;
  • Optimized performance details.

Attention

  • This version will NOT unlock any achievements;
  • This version will NOT inherit the original save data.

content_descriptors.notes: Mild Sexsual Innuendo, Mild Bad Language
